CookieConsent.title: We use cookies
CookieConsent.body: To ensure the best user experience, we use cookies on our website. You can find more information about the use and management of cookies in our cookie policy.
CookieConsent.minimalBody: We use cookies to provide you with a better browsing experience.
CookieConsent.notice: By clicking the <highlight>{actionLabel}</highlight> button, you consent to the use of cookies.

GDPR.title: Privacy notice (GDPR)
intro: This privacy notice summarises the main rules of personal data processing related to the services of Zodiacs Rent a Car (ZODIACSRENTACAR).

We always handle data in accordance with the GDPR, as well as Spanish and Hungarian data protection regulations; we only collect information to the extent and for the duration that is necessary, and we always provide transparent information about data processing.

items: Company name: ZODIACSRENTACAR
Registered office: Calle Juan de Austria 111, 35600 Puerto del Rosario, Las Palmas, Spain
E-mail: info@zodiacsrentacar.com
Website: www.zodiacsrentacar.com

sections.heading: 2. Purposes of data processing
paragraphs: We only use personal data for purposes necessary to provide our services:

items: preparing and documenting car rental offers and contracts
managing and confirming online reservations
vehicle handover, delivery and customer service communication
invoicing, financial administration and fulfilment of legal obligations
customer communication by phone, e-mail, WhatsApp or other channels
marketing and newsletter sending with the explicit consent of the data subject
statistical analysis and service development in an anonymous form

sections.heading: 3. Legal basis of data processing
paragraphs: Different processes may have different legal bases, but in all cases we rely on one of the following GDPR provisions:

items: performance or preparation of a contract ‚Äì GDPR Article 6(1)(b)
compliance with a legal obligation (e.g. accounting rules) ‚Äì GDPR Article 6(1)(c)
legitimate interests of the controller (for example fraud prevention) ‚Äì GDPR Article 6(1)(f)
consent of the data subject (e.g. newsletter, contact) ‚Äì GDPR Article 6(1)(a)

sections.heading: 4. Categories of data processed
paragraphs: In online forms and during contract conclusion we only request data that is essential for car rental. The main categories are as follows:

lists.title: Booking data
items: rental period (from‚Äìto)
number of passengers, age and height of children
selected vehicle category and requested extra services

lists.title: Personal data of renter and driver
items: full name (two surnames and two given names)
place and date of birth, mother‚Äôs name
nationality and address details

lists.title: Contact details
items: phone number and preferred communication channel (WhatsApp, Messenger etc.)
e-mail address

lists.title: Identification documents
items: type and number of ID document, date of issue and expiry
driving licence number, category, validity and date of issue
declaration that the driving licence has been valid for more than 3 years

lists.title: Additional driver or contact person
items: data similar to the primary renter for each additional driver
name and phone number of a contact person if different from the renter

lists.title: Billing and delivery data
items: name or company name, billing address and (for companies) tax number
e-mail address required for sending the invoice electronically
name and address of hotel or apartment for delivery

sections.heading: 5. Duration of data processing
paragraphs: Data necessary for the performance of the service is retained for 5 years from the closure of the rental in order to enforce civil law claims.
Accounting and tax documents are stored for 8 years in accordance with applicable laws.
Data processed on the basis of consent is kept until the withdrawal of consent or until the purpose ceases.

sections.heading: 6. Data transfers and processors
paragraphs: We only share data with partners that are essential for providing the service and we conclude data processing agreements with them. Typical recipients:

items: accounting and financial service providers
hosting and IT infrastructure providers
invoicing systems and payment service providers
courier services or partners providing delivery

notes: We do not transfer data outside the European Union and we ensure appropriate encryption and access control.

sections.heading: 7. Rights of data subjects
paragraphs: Data subjects may exercise their rights under the GDPR at any time:

items: right to information and access
right to rectification or erasure
right to request restriction of processing
right to object to processing based on legitimate interest
right to data portability
right to withdraw consent at any time

notes: In case of a complaint, you may contact the Hungarian National Authority for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (1055 Budapest, Falk Miksa utca 9-11., ugyfelszolgalat@naih.hu, naih.hu).

sections.heading: 8. Data security and cookie management
paragraphs: We protect personal data against unauthorised access, alteration or loss by physical, technical and organisational measures.
Our website uses cookies for operation, statistics and personalisation. Details are included in the Cookie Policy, where you can also modify your consent settings at any time.

contact.title: Contact and enforcement of rights
paragraphs: If you have any questions about data processing or would like to exercise your rights, please contact us using one of the channels below.
We will respond to your requests within 30 days at the latest; in justified cases this deadline may be extended in accordance with the GDPR.

CookiePolicy.title: Cookie policy
intro: This notice explains which cookies are used on the Zodiacs Rent a Car website, for what purpose data is processed, and how you can change your settings.
Cookies are small data files that help the website operate, compile statistics and display personalised content.

sections.heading: 1. What is a cookie?
paragraphs: A cookie is a short text file stored by your browser when you visit our site. Cookies do not contain data that directly identifies you, but they help recognise your device and remember your settings.

sections.heading: 2. Types of cookies we use
paragraphs: For proper operation we use cookies for different purposes:

lists.title: Essential cookies
items: they are indispensable for the operation of the website, security processes and the use of forms
legal basis: legitimate interest (GDPR Article 6(1)(f))

lists.title: Functional cookies
items: they remember the selected language and temporary form data
legal basis: consent (GDPR Article 6(1)(a))

lists.title: Analytics and statistics cookies
items: they measure traffic anonymously and help optimise our service
legal basis: consent (GDPR Article 6(1)(a))

lists.title: Marketing cookies
items: they allow personalised offers and remarketing ads
legal basis: consent (GDPR Article 6(1)(a))

sections.heading: 3. Cookie lifetime
paragraphs: Session cookies: active only during the browsing session and then automatically deleted.
Persistent cookies: stored for a fixed period (typically 30‚Äì365 days) or until you delete them manually.

sections.heading: 4. Third-party cookies
paragraphs: Some cookies are placed by our partners (e.g. Google, Meta, TikTok) for statistical analysis and personalised advertising.
These cookies are subject to the providers‚Äô own privacy policies, which you can find on their official websites.

sections.heading: 5. Consent and settings
paragraphs: On your first visit a cookie banner appears where you can choose to accept all cookies, use only essential cookies or set custom preferences.
You can change these choices at any time in your browser settings or via the ‚ÄúChange cookie settings‚Äù link placed on the website.

sections.heading: 6. Managing cookies in browsers
paragraphs: In most browsers you can delete or block cookies. The following help pages explain the settings: Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari and Microsoft Edge.
Please note that some functions may work only in a limited way without cookies.

sections.heading: 7. Contact
paragraphs: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or about data protection, we are happy to help you via the following channels:

items: E-mail: info@zodiacsrentacar.com
Website: www.zodiacsrentacar.com

paragraphs: With the local team of Zodiacs Rent a Car, car rental in Fuerteventura and Lanzarote is convenient and quick. After your online booking we arrange airport or hotel delivery, help you choose the right model for your trip and discuss every detail in the language that is most comfortable for you.

Our fleet ranges from compact city cars to spacious SUVs, all with unlimited mileage, a free second driver and full SSCP insurance. At Zodiacs every vehicle is regularly serviced and we document its condition with photos before handover, so you can start your journey with peace of mind.

You can count on us during your trip as well: we share the best beach parking spots in Fuerteventura, lookout points in Lanzarote and our favourite tapas bars. You can reach us by phone, e-mail and WhatsApp, so you can always ask for help or a personalised offer.

We tailor our service specifically to the needs of travellers holidaying in the Canary Islands. We know how important fast administration is, so we respond immediately on WhatsApp, by phone and e-mail ‚Äì whether you contact us before your flight or after arrival.

According to our customers‚Äô feedback, what they appreciate most about Zodiacs Rent a Car is that we agree on everything in advance and there are no surprises at the counter. We pay special attention to families, adventurous explorers and business travellers: we can provide child seats, roof racks or even surfboard holders on request.

In our blog and travel guides we share detailed itinerary suggestions, so your rental car becomes not just a means of transport but the key to discovery. The local Zodiacs team continuously updates its tips, so the lesser-known beaches, restaurants and hiking trails won‚Äôt be left off your list.

highlights.title: Why choose us?
items: Multilingual customer service in Fuerteventura and Lanzarote, with a truly local presence.
Transparent rental contract with digital approval and all costs agreed in advance.
Flexible pickup at the airport, at your accommodation or at a pre-arranged meeting point.
Local tips, parking advice and route suggestions so you can get the most out of the islands with your Zodiacs car.

details.title: Car rental step by step with the Zodiacs Rent a Car team
details.intro: We want you to know what to expect already at the planning stage. That‚Äôs why we designed every Zodiacs process to be transparent, fast and tailored to you ‚Äì from booking to returning the car.

sections.heading: 1. Choosing the right car for you
body: Before booking we briefly discuss how many people are travelling, how much luggage space you need and what kind of routes you are planning. For example, if you want to explore the northern mountains or the winding roads of volcanic terrain, you may need a more powerful model and stronger air conditioning.

Our offer always includes exact photos and equipment details of the vehicle, so you can easily compare your options. The Zodiacs team will also help if you have special needs, such as a child seat, roof box or the transport of sports equipment.

sections.heading: 2. Booking and contract in just a few clicks
body: The Zodiacs online quote form guides you through the entire process in Hungarian. You provide your arrival and departure dates, pickup location, and within minutes you receive personalised prices including full SSCP insurance.
We confirm the booking by e-mail and send you the contract digitally so you can review it comfortably before travelling. This way there is no paperwork on site ‚Äì just a quick handover of the car.

sections.heading: 3. Pickup where it‚Äôs most convenient for you
body: Whether you arrive in Fuerteventura or Lanzarote, our colleagues monitor your flight and will be waiting for you at the airport or in front of your accommodation at the agreed time. In case of significant delay we react flexibly and stay in contact throughout.
If you don‚Äôt want to waste a single minute of your holiday standing in queues, the Zodiacs mobile office prepares the necessary documents on site so you can set off with your chosen car in no time.

sections.heading: 4. Support throughout your trip
body: When we hand over the car, we share current parking and traffic information, our favourite excursion spots and service providers we can confidently recommend. If you have questions during your journey, you can reach the Zodiacs team via WhatsApp or phone.

When you return the car, we perform a quick check and close the rental, and if you like, we will give you an updated, personalised offer for your next trip as well. Our goal is for you to feel that the Zodiacs car contributed to the quality of your holiday every time.

meta.title: Fuerteventura sights by car ‚Äì 3 must-see places with a rental car | Zodiacs Rent a Car
meta.description: Discover Fuerteventura‚Äôs most beautiful sights by car! Corralejo dunes, Betancuria and Ajuy caves are all easy to reach by car. Car rental in Fuerteventura ‚Äì Zodiacs Rent a Car.

image.alt: View of the Corralejo sand dunes in Fuerteventura

hero.title: Fuerteventura sights by car ‚Äì 3 places you shouldn‚Äôt miss if you explore the island by rental car
hero.subtitle: If you rent a car in Fuerteventura, you can discover all the wonders of the island at your own pace. No rush, no bus schedules ‚Äì just the smell of the ocean, sunshine and the feeling of freedom.
hero.description: We‚Äôve collected three locations that are easy to reach by car, safe to access and guaranteed to provide unforgettable experiences.
hero.author: Zodiacs Rent a Car

sections.title: Corralejo sand dunes ‚Äì Fuerteventura‚Äôs most iconic natural wonder
paragraphs: In the north of Fuerteventura lies the Corralejo Natural Park (Parque Natural de Corralejo), one of the island‚Äôs most popular attractions.
The huge white sand dunes contrast with the turquoise waters of the Atlantic Ocean ‚Äì it‚Äôs a true desert atmosphere right by the sea.

access.title: Getting there by car
access.description: The FV-1 or FV-1a road leads through the dunes towards Corralejo. There are several designated parking areas along the road from which the beaches and dunes are easily accessible on foot.

tip.title: Tip
tip.description: Stop at the Grandes Playas de Corralejo beach, where the dunes run straight into the ocean ‚Äì a perfect photo spot!

sections.title: Betancuria ‚Äì the historic capital with winding roads and breathtaking viewpoints
paragraphs: Located in the hilly inland of the island, Betancuria is the former capital of Fuerteventura and today the cultural heart of the island.
The little town lies in a green valley among volcanic hills, with picturesque streets and a peaceful atmosphere awaiting visitors.

access.title: Getting there by car
access.description: Betancuria can be reached via the FV-30 road from Puerto del Rosario, Caleta de Fuste or P√°jara. Although the road is winding, it is well maintained and offers stunning panoramic views.

items.label: Mirador de Guise y Ayose ‚Äì two huge bronze statues guarding the valley.
Mirador de Morro Velosa ‚Äì one of the most beautiful viewpoints on the island.

sections.title: Ajuy caves and black sand beach ‚Äì the wild west side of Fuerteventura
paragraphs: The western coast of the island is rougher and rockier, but that‚Äôs exactly what makes it special. Here you‚Äôll find Ajuy, a quiet fishing village known for its famous black sand beach and the Cuevas de Ajuy caves.
A built walkway along the cliffs leads to the caves where you can see rock formations millions of years old while listening to the roar of the sea. The place is especially magical at sunset.

access.title: Getting there by car
access.description: You can reach Ajuy from P√°jara along the FV-621 road, on fully asphalted road.

sections.title: Why does it make sense to rent a car in Fuerteventura?
paragraphs: The sights on the island are often far apart and public transport is limited.
A rental car gives you freedom ‚Äì you can discover remote beaches and mountain villages at your own pace.
The roads are in excellent condition, traffic is moderate and parking is free almost everywhere.

links.label: Check out our rental cars ‚Äì Zodiacs Rent a Car Fuerteventura

sections.title: Travel sustainably ‚Äì protect Fuerteventura‚Äôs natural treasures!
paragraphs: As locals, we love and protect our island. We kindly ask you to respect nature too:
bullets: don‚Äôt leave litter behind, use designated bins;
don‚Äôt throw cigarette butts into the sand or among the rocks;
stay on marked paths, especially among the dunes and on rocky coasts.
sections.closing: If you do so, Fuerteventura will thank you ‚Äì and welcome you back.

cta.title: Explore the island comfortably by rental car!
paragraphs: Discover sand dunes, villages tucked away in the mountains and ocean-side caves at your own rhythm.
Zodiacs Rent a Car ‚Äì car rental in Fuerteventura made easy, with fast administration, reliable cars and local tips.

buttons.label: Book online in a few clicks

meta.title: Warning! Dangerous rip currents in Fuerteventura ‚Äì How to swim safely in the ocean
meta.description: Rip currents are common on Fuerteventura‚Äôs beaches and can suddenly sweep swimmers away. Learn how to recognise them and avoid the danger safely.

image.alt: Warning sign on the wild beach of Cofete in Fuerteventura

hero.title: Warning! Dangerous rip currents in Fuerteventura ‚Äì how to swim safely in the ocean
hero.subtitle: If you want to swim on Fuerteventura‚Äôs wild beaches, you need more than a sense of adventure ‚Äì you must also understand how rip currents work.
hero.description: We explain how to recognise the signs of rip currents from Cofete to El Cotillo and what to do if you get caught by the current.
hero.author: Zodiacs Rent a Car

sections.title: What is a rip current and why is it dangerous?
paragraphs: On the Atlantic coast, rip currents are the most common hidden danger: the mass of water pushed towards the shore by the waves flows back to deeper water in a narrow, powerful channel.
This phenomenon is insidious because it often forms where the water looks smoother and calmer ‚Äì and this is exactly where swimmers tend to enter the sea.
bullets: A seemingly wave-free water surface is not necessarily safe: that may be where the rip current flows out.
The current doesn‚Äôt pull you down, it pulls you sideways and outwards, so in most tragedies exhaustion is the real cause.

sections.title: How to recognise a dangerous section
paragraphs: When you arrive, take a minute to observe the water. The signs of a rip current are visible to the naked eye if you know what to look for.
At Cofete, for example, there is a warning sign, but often it faces the wrong way because of the wind ‚Äì so always inform yourself before entering the water.
bullets: Darker, more turbid water because the seabed suddenly deepens.
A strip that appears calmer between the waves, where the water flows outwards.
Foam, algae or debris that moves away from the shore rather than towards it.
Flags, signs or warnings from locals ‚Äì always take them seriously.

tip.title: Tip
tip.description: When you arrive, take a photo of the warning signs so you can later recall what each flag means on that beach.

sections.title: What to do if you get caught in the current?
paragraphs: The most important thing is not to panic. A rip current does not pull you under, but it flows faster than most people can swim.
If you exhaust yourself before you escape the current, you can get into serious danger ‚Äì so you need to react with strategy.
bullets: Breathe deeply and keep your head above water.
Do not swim directly towards the shore ‚Äì the current is stronger than you.
Swim parallel to the shore until you leave the narrow channel of the current.
If you get tired, float on your back, signal for help and let the waves carry you until you can get out.
sections.closing: The calmer you stay, the better your chances of getting out on your own.

sections.title: Personal story: I pulled three children out at Cofete
paragraphs: ‚ÄúIt happened on Cofete beach when my little girl and two cousins were pulled into the current in a matter of seconds. I didn‚Äôt shout, I didn‚Äôt wave ‚Äì I needed all my energy for swimming.
I managed to get all three of them back to shore, but the experience taught me for life: you must respect the ocean, not try to defeat it.‚Äù

tip.title: Lesson
tip.description: Always watch how the water moves and teach your family how to react if they get caught in a current.

sections.title: Did you know? The current is faster than a professional swimmer
paragraphs: Numbers make it easier to understand why you shouldn‚Äôt try to fight the current with sheer force.
bullets: An Olympic swimmer covers about 2.3 meters per second.
A rip current typically moves around 2.4 meters per second ‚Äì so it is always one step ahead of you.

sections.title: Respect nature, protect the island
paragraphs: Awareness doesn‚Äôt stop at the water‚Äôs edge: keeping the beach clean and following local rules is everyone‚Äôs responsibility.
bullets: Don‚Äôt leave your rubbish behind ‚Äì take your waste with you.
Don‚Äôt throw cigarette butts into the sand or among rocks.
Stay on marked paths, especially among dunes and in protected areas.

sections.title: Travel smart with a rental car
paragraphs: If you explore Fuerteventura by car, always have enough water, sunscreen and fresh information about currents and wind conditions with you.
That way you can enjoy both freedom and safety at the same time.
sections.closing: Share this article with others so fewer travellers get into danger because of rip currents.

cta.title: Travel safely with Zodiacs rental cars
paragraphs: We help you choose a car that takes you even to the wild, lesser-known beaches ‚Äì along with all the safety tips you need.
Zodiacs Rent a Car ‚Äì local team, fast communication, personalised safety advice.

AboutUs.headline: Zodiacs Rent a Car
AboutUs.intro: Zodiacs Rent a Car is a Hungarian family business whose heart and home is Fuerteventura. We live and work in an international environment, but we know exactly what matters to travellers coming here: safety, reliability and a friendly attitude.
AboutUs.why_text: For us this island is not just a tourist destination, it is our home. We love the sunshine, the ocean, the relaxed lifestyle and the feeling of endless freedom. These are the experiences we want to share with you when you rent a car from us.
AboutUs.fleet_text: In our fleet you‚Äôll find practical small cars, family models and even larger vehicles. We regularly maintain and clean all our cars so you can explore the island carefree.
AboutUs.delivery_text: You can pick up your rental car not only in Fuerteventura but also in Lanzarote. Whether you arrive at the airport or stay in a hotel, we deliver the car to you flexibly so your trip starts comfortably.
AboutUs.more_text: For us, car rental is not only about handing over the keys. If you wish, we help with itineraries, local tips and show you where to go so you can experience the real Fuerteventura feeling: hidden coves, sandy beaches, unique landscapes and culinary experiences.
AboutUs.mission_text: Our goal is for every guest to experience the island‚Äôs charms in freedom, comfort and safety. As a family and as local entrepreneurs, we work with our hearts to ensure that you can take the special atmosphere of Fuerteventura home with you.
AboutUs.cta: Rent a car from us and experience Fuerteventura the way we love it!

Contact.title: Questions about car rental in Fuerteventura or Lanzarote?
Contact.p1: Get in touch and we‚Äôll help you find the best solution for you! Whether it‚Äôs advance booking, airport delivery or car handover at your hotel, our customer service responds quickly and flexibly.
Contact.p2: Fill out the form below, send us an e-mail, a message on Messenger, WhatsApp or Viber, or call us! We are happy to help so your holiday can be truly carefree.

form.title: Request a personalised quote
form.description: Tell us when and under what conditions you‚Äôd like to rent a car ‚Äì we‚Äôll reply within a few hours.

consents.terms: I accept the <link>General Terms and Conditions</link>

feedback.success: Thank you! We will contact you soon.
feedback.error: Oops, something went wrong. Please try again later.

errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid e-mail address
errors.privacyRequired: Accepting the privacy notice is mandatory
errors.termsRequired: Accepting the Terms and Conditions is mandatory
errors.rentalStartRequired: Please select the rental start date
errors.rentalEndRequired: Please select the rental end date
errors.arrivalFlightRequired: Please enter your arrival flight number
errors.departureFlightRequired: Please enter your return flight number

Cars.title: Discover Fuerteventura and Lanzarote in total freedom with our cars!
Cars.p1: With us, car rental is simple and fast: choose the vehicle that suits you best and we deliver it to the airport or directly to your hotel. Thanks to our flexible car rental options you can enjoy your holiday without worries, whether you need a car for a short trip or a longer stay.
Cars.p2: It‚Äôs worth booking your chosen car in advance so it‚Äôs guaranteed to be available when you arrive. Browse our cars below, click for details and book online comfortably!

Insurance.title: Insurance (SSCP)
Insurance.igic_note: +15% IGIC not included. Maximum +30 ‚Ç¨ per rental.
Insurance.sscp_intro: For a very small extra fee, the included insurance can be extended. In addition to the extensive coverage already included in the rental price, SSCP eliminates the following exclusions:
Insurance.coverage_note: With this insurance, our coverage is extended to all exclusions (except for those that no insurer covers).
Insurance.footnote: * +15% IGIC not included. Maximum +30 ‚Ç¨ per rental.
Insurance.pricing_text: Rent it now for just 2 ‚Ç¨ per day, up to a maximum of 30 ‚Ç¨ for any model, and enjoy your rental without worries.
Insurance.closing: The best way is to enjoy your trip with full coverage.

general.title: General provisions
general.p1: The renter must always carry a valid physical rental contract in the vehicle, as the Spanish authorities may issue a fine if this is missing.
general.p2: All violations and related costs arising during the rental are borne by the renter, without prejudice to any legal action.
general.p3: The renter is responsible for refuelling the vehicle correctly.
general.p4: The provider reserves the right to refuse rental based on the renter‚Äôs previous incidents or non-compliance with the General Conditions. If the selected model is not available, we provide a similar or higher category model.

services.title: Included services

kanary.title: Canary Islands
kanary.i6: GPS: included on some models as standard
kanary.i10: Late return by a few hours: included

peninsula.title: Mainland / Balearic Islands
peninsula.i11: Late return by a few hours: 50 ‚Ç¨

services.foot1: (*) Full insurance with no excess ‚Äì with exclusions (upper bodywork, undercarriage, interior, misuse, etc.). Details: Insurance.
services.foot2: (**) Mileage is unlimited for up to 28 days.

canary.title: Rental conditions ‚Äì Canary Islands
canary.i1: Immediate booking confirmation; if the requested model is not available, a similar or better model is provided.
canary.i2: 100% full insurance with no excess; unlimited mileage; taxes and airport charges included.
canary.i3: Audio guides available at the rental office.
canary.i4: Child seats, boosters and roof racks are free of charge.
canary.i5: Additional driver(s) are free ‚Äì upon request at the rental office.
canary.i6: Fuel policy: fuel level at pickup may require a deposit.
canary.i7: Changes/cancellations: free of charge; can be made online or via e-mail/phone.
canary.i8: For airport bookings, reservations are held for up to 60 minutes based on actual arrival time.
canary.i9: Child seats/boosters are free; seats for 0‚Äì18 kg must be installed on the rear seat, facing with or against the direction of travel; boosters are for 15‚Äì36 kg; installation is the customer‚Äôs responsibility.

peninsula.title: Rental conditions ‚Äì Mainland and Balearic Islands
peninsula.i1: All prices are in euros. Minimum rental period: 24 hours. 29 minutes grace period; beyond that a full day will be charged.
peninsula.i2: If travelling abroad, International Assistance Insurance is required; the list of permitted countries is included in the contract.
peninsula.i3: Payment: only with a physical credit card in the name of the contract holder. Cash/traveller‚Äôs cheques are not accepted.
peninsula.i4: Deposit: 200 ‚Ç¨ for smaller categories, 400 ‚Ç¨ for larger/premium/MPV; for some categories a valid international card pre-authorisation is required.
peninsula.i5: If the car is not refuelled, the fuel cost plus an 18 ‚Ç¨ service fee will be charged.
peninsula.i8: Age/licence requirements by group (see contract); minimum 2 years valid driving licence.
peninsula.i9: Airport rentals in Madrid/Barcelona are not allowed without a flight ticket (arrival and return flight details are required).
peninsula.i10: Travelling abroad: permitted countries ‚Äì AT, DE, BE, FR, NL, IT, LU, MC, CH, PT, AD, GI; other countries are not allowed; cross-border one-way drops require prior approval; commercial vehicles cannot be dropped abroad.
peninsula.i11: Accessories (child seats, roof racks, keys, documents) must be kept safe by the renter; penalties may be charged in case of loss or damage.

schedule.title: Opening hours and deliveries
schedule.i2: Airport offices: every day 08:00‚Äì23:00 (may vary seasonally).
schedule.i3: Discounted counter delivery: up to 36.3 ‚Ç¨, depending on availability.
schedule.i4: Off-site delivery/pickup: 27 ‚Ç¨/50 ‚Ç¨/100 ‚Ç¨ (5 km / 50 km / 100 km), to be requested 48 hours in advance.
schedule.i5: Out-of-hours delivery/pickup at our own offices: +50 ‚Ç¨.
schedule.i6: In cities without an office: 0.84 ‚Ç¨/km (min. 57 ‚Ç¨) to the nearest office (round-trip distance).
schedule.i7: Return to the office during opening hours; outside of this the renter remains liable until collection.
schedule.i8: Holding reservations: max. 120 minutes from the contractual time (within office opening hours); for flights, the actual arrival time applies.

liability.title: Liability disclaimer
liability.p1: The provider is not liable for any damage resulting from defective performance, omission, interruption, deletion, delay, computer virus, theft, destruction, unauthorized access, or the use of data or information.
liability.p2: The user expressly accepts that the use of the website is at their own risk, including the full cost of services and repairs necessary for the operation of the system.
liability.p3: Entities associated with the provider and their employees are likewise not liable for any loss or damage arising from the use of the website or attempts to use it.

general.title: General conditions (Fuerteventura / Lanzarote)
general.i1: As a rule, we do not rent to drivers under 23 years of age, only subject to a surcharge.
general.i2: After confirmation, the booking may be cancelled in the following cases:
general.i2a: the data provided by the customer are not accurate/true/up to date
general.i3: Required: valid driving licence, ID card/passport, address and an active phone number.

vehicle.title: Vehicle conditions
vehicle.i1: The reserved vehicle model is indicative; it may be replaced with a similar model of the same category.
vehicle.i2: For vehicles equipped with GPS, location tracking is used for security purposes in compliance with applicable regulations.
vehicle.i3: The vehicle may not leave the island on which it was rented.
vehicle.i4: Use: in compliance with the law, on public roads only; use for prohibited/illegal purposes or for advertising purposes is not allowed.
vehicle.i5: Use of the recommended fuel is mandatory; the vehicle must always be locked when parked.
vehicle.i6: Child seats are provided on collection; correct installation is mandatory.
vehicle.i7: Luggage/surfboards must be secured on the roof rack.
vehicle.i8: In the event of a breakdown, stop the vehicle, park it safely and contact us immediately.
vehicle.i9: The renter is responsible for the vehicle from collection until its proper return.

handover.title: Handover and return
handover.i1: Handover and return take place at the airport and at the time confirmed in the booking.
handover.i2: The vehicle may not be returned on a different island. Exception: Lanzarote, subject to a surcharge (40 ‚Ç¨).
handover.i3: On return, the condition of the vehicle must correspond to that at collection (normal wear and tear excepted).
handover.i4: In the event of an incident/damage, submission of documentation/a report is mandatory.
handover.i5: In case of extreme dirtiness, a cleaning surcharge of 70 ‚Ç¨ will be applied.
handover.i6: No refund is given in case of early return.
handover.i7: Do not leave any items in the vehicle on return; we do not accept liability for any loss.

price.title: The rental price includes
price.i4: Pick-up and drop-off at the airport
price.i6: Baby seats and child boosters free of charge (non-ISOFIX; ISOFIX seats can be rented as an option)
price.i7: Basic insurance with a 300‚Äì500 ‚Ç¨ deposit (deductible in case of damage)

base_excludes.title: What basic insurance does not cover
base_excludes.i7: Personal belongings in the car (boot, glovebox)
base_excludes.note: The cost of these damages is borne by the renter.

deposit.title: Deposit and retention
deposit.i1: Cash deposit: 300‚Äì500 ‚Ç¨ (no credit card deposit required).
deposit.i2: The deposit may be retained for up to 15 days; it will be refunded by bank transfer (e.g. Revolut, Caixabank).

full.title: Full insurance (optional)
full.p1: With full insurance, no 300‚Äì500 ‚Ç¨ deposit is required, and the vast majority of damages are covered.
full.note: Exceptions: damages resulting from negligence or breach of the terms and conditions (examples below).

exceptions.title: Exceptions ‚Äì examples
exceptions.i1: Driving on unpaved or prohibited roads (e.g. Cofete)
exceptions.i2: Driving under the influence of alcohol/psychoactive substances
exceptions.i3: Using a mobile phone while driving without hands-free equipment
exceptions.i4: Ignoring a fault indicated on the dashboard and continuing to drive
exceptions.i5: Transporting hazardous/flammable materials, animals or unauthorised cargo
exceptions.i6: Illegal/unauthorised activity, sub-renting to a third party
exceptions.i7: Items on the roof without an approved carrier
exceptions.i8: Water ingress/interior damage beyond reasonable care
exceptions.i9: Damage caused when the vehicle is left unlocked, or by an unauthorised driver
exceptions.i10: Exceeding the contractually agreed rental period

sections.heading: 1. The Contracting Parties and Conclusion of the Agreement
paragraphs: This agreement is concluded between ZODIACSRENTACAR Thomy Fuerteventura SL. (hereinafter: Lessor) and the natural or legal person accepting the offer (hereinafter: Lessee).
The Parties accept the provisions of the Agreement as binding and valid for the entire rental period, up to the final completion of the vehicle return.
Requesting an offer and making a booking is possible via the www.zodiacsrentacar.com website and the contact channels specified above.
We send confirmation or possible rejection of the offer request and the subsequent booking to the e-mail address provided in the data form.

The Lessor reserves the right, for operational reasons ‚Äì in particular if the requested vehicle is not available ‚Äì to reject or refuse a given booking request if it is incomplete, inaccurate or does not comply with the applicable conditions.
The person named in the Agreement, the beneficiary of the booking and the primary driver must be the same person; the Agreement may not be transferred to a third party.

For security reasons, we do not request banking or financial information through the platform, but the Lessee is required to present such data (in particular their credit card) when collecting the rented vehicle at the office.
The credit card must be in the Lessee‚Äôs name and must remain valid throughout the rental period and for a further three (3) months thereafter in the Canary Islands to cover any subsequent costs.
We accept major credit cards (Visa/MC/Amex/Diners) and bank cards issued by financial institutions; debit cards are not accepted.

For the duration of the rental, the Lessor accepts a deposit of 500 ‚Ç¨, which will be transferred back within 15 calendar days after the return of the vehicle, provided that its condition complies with the Agreement.

Processing of personal data and other legal conditions relating to the operation of the platform are governed by the GDPR privacy policy available on the Lessor‚Äôs website, the content of which the Lessee acknowledges and accepts by signing this Agreement.

lists.title: Lessor‚Äôs details:
items: Company name: ZODIACSRENTACAR (www.zodiacsrentacar.com)
Registered office: Calle Juan de Austria 111, 35600 Puerto de Rosario, Las Palmas, Spain
Tax identification number (CIF): B13702493
E-mail address: info@zodiacsrentacar.es
Main telephone number: +34 683-192-422

sections.heading: 2. Rental Conditions and Driver Requirements
paragraphs: The Lessor does not rent vehicles to drivers under 25 years of age.
Users may only rent a vehicle from the Lessor if they meet the conditions set out below.
Compliance with these conditions is mandatory and cannot be waived.
The Lessor does not charge a fee to users who cannot enter into an agreement due to failure to meet the conditions, as in such cases the booking cannot be concluded.
The same conditions apply to any additional drivers designated by the Lessee.
After confirmation of the booking, the Lessor is entitled to cancel it in the following cases.

lists.title: Rental conditions:
items: They are at least twenty-five (25) years old.
They hold at least a category B driving licence valid in the European Union.
They have at least two (2) years of verified driving experience from the date of obtaining their driving licence at the time of booking.

lists.title: The booking may be cancelled if:
items: it is found that the information provided by the customer is not correct, not true or not up to date.
any necessary document expires during the rental period.
the Lessee breaches the rental conditions.

notes: (*) In accordance with Spanish law... (this paragraph contains text on Spanish legislation, which is left unchanged due to legal verification).

sections.heading: 3. Conditions Relating to the Rented Vehicle
paragraphs: The reserved vehicle model is indicative and may be replaced with a vehicle of the same or higher category available in the Lessor‚Äôs fleet.

GPS tracking: by signing the rental agreement, the Lessee consents to the vehicle being tracked; the Lessor uses geolocation data solely to ensure the security of the vehicle and to verify compliance with the rental conditions.
Use restrictions: the vehicle may not leave the island on which it was rented, unless a separate agreement is made and recorded in the booking system.
If the rental agreement is extended to the island of Lanzarote or if the return location is Lanzarote, the Parties consider these conditions binding under such circumstances as well.
In the event of a malfunction, the vehicle must be stopped safely in accordance with traffic rules and the Lessor must be notified without delay.
Before the start of the rental period, the Lessee is obliged to ensure that all mandatory accessories are present.
The Lessee is responsible, from collection until confirmed return, for lawful and technically appropriate operation of the vehicle and for preserving its condition.

If the return does not take place in the manner specified by the Lessor (for example, without personal handover), the Lessee‚Äôs responsibility is extended until the vehicle‚Äôs actual receipt is recorded and its condition is checked.
The costs of repairing any identified faults and damage are borne by the Lessee.

lists.title: Other usage rules:
items: The Lessee accepts as binding and applicable all relevant national regulations and legislation, including traffic rules.
The vehicle may not be used for illegal purposes or as a means of committing illegal acts.
The vehicle may be driven only on public roads with a solid surface.
Note: if the vehicle is used on unpaved roads, any resulting punctures, recovery, towing and on-site repair costs are borne by the Lessee.
The vehicle may not be used for commercial or advertising purposes.
Only the fuel recommended by the manufacturer may be used; if incorrect fuel is added, the Lessor must be notified immediately and the vehicle must not be started.
The Lessee must ensure that when leaving or parking the vehicle it is fully locked and that all reasonable measures are taken to prevent unauthorised use.
When parking, the parking brake and an appropriate gear must be engaged; on a slope, the steering wheels must be turned towards the kerb.
Child seats are provided by the Lessor on collection, but their correct installation and use is always the responsibility of the Lessee.
Sporting equipment (such as surfboards) may not be transported or stored in the passenger compartment.
The Lessee must ensure that luggage or surfboards are properly secured to the roof rack, if one has been rented.

sections.heading: 4. Rules for Vehicle Handover and Return
paragraphs: Handover and return of the rented vehicle take place at the office specified in the booking, on the dates and at the times confirmed by the Lessor.
Under no circumstances may the vehicle be returned on an island other than that specified in the Agreement.
The vehicle may only be collected during office hours; return may be arranged outside office hours under the conditions set out in the booking process.
Outside office hours or before opening, return at the airport is free of charge; delivery to other locations may incur an additional fee, which is recorded in the booking system for each agreed case.
The office‚Äôs opening hours are generally 10:00‚Äì13:00 and 16:00‚Äì20:00; precise information can be requested by e-mail, WhatsApp or telephone.
In case of delay or flight cancellation, the Lessee must inform the Lessor in due time; failure to do so means the Lessor cannot guarantee the booking will be maintained.
If the booking cannot be maintained, the Lessor reserves the right to cancel it and to dispose of the vehicle without any obligation to pay compensation.
The vehicle must be returned in the condition recorded at collection; if this is not the case, the Lessee must provide documentation of the events that occurred.
No refund is given if the vehicle is returned earlier than the time specified in the Agreement.
Fuel: the vehicle must be returned with the fuel level recorded at collection; in case of a shortfall, the Lessee bears the cost of refuelling and any service fee.
If there is excess fuel, we are unable to reimburse the difference.
No personal belongings may remain in the vehicle upon return; the Lessor does not accept liability for any items left inside and cannot store or forward them.

sections.heading: 5. Services and Insurance
paragraphs: The final price of the vehicle rental includes the following items.
No excess (deposit, cash or card pre-authorisation) is required, except for the 500 ‚Ç¨ deposit specified in point 1.
It is important to note that, under Spanish traffic regulations, the use of an approved child seat is mandatory for minors under 135 cm.

items: Taxes (including IGIC/IVA).
Unlimited kilometres.
Second driver free of charge.
Service at our office (Calle Juan de Austria 111, 35600 Puerto de Rosario, Las Palmas).
Free booking cancellation (see point 9).
Child seats and boosters provided free of charge (non-ISOFIX).
The following zero-excess insurance cover: Collision Damage Waiver (CDW), Theft Protection (TP), Third Party Insurance (TI).

sections.heading: 6. Situations Not Covered by the Insurance
paragraphs: Important! The above zero-excess insurance does not cover the following situations or events; the Lessee bears full financial responsibility for any resulting damages and costs.

items: Damage to tyres and wheels occurring on non-asphalted roads.
Loss, breakage or damage of the car keys.
Refuelling with the wrong type of fuel (the fuel type is indicated on every vehicle).
Careless driving or accidents under the influence of alcohol, drugs or any toxic or psychotropic substances.
Accidents and/or damage occurring while driving off-road (on non-solid surfaces).
Fines (parking, speeding, traffic offences).

sections.heading: 7. Optional Extras
paragraphs: As optional or additional services, Lessees may rent the extras listed below, which are not included in the vehicle rental price.
With proper fastening, roof racks are suitable for transporting up to two surfboards.

Under no circumstances does the Lessor accept liability for items transported on the roof of the vehicle or for any damage caused to third parties by such items; all such damage is the responsibility of the Lessee.
All basic and optional services are available to the Lessee and are guaranteed under the Lessor‚Äôs general terms and conditions.

items: Roof rack for transporting luggage, at the price shown on the website; does not include ropes, only the rails and bars for securing it to the vehicle.

sections.heading: 8. Fuel Policy
paragraphs: The Lessee must return the vehicle with the same amount of fuel as when it was collected.
If the Lessee refuels the vehicle with the wrong type of fuel, the necessary repairs and costs are borne by the Lessee.

sections.heading: 9. Payment and Refund Policy
paragraphs: The Lessor offers online payment options for settling the rental fee via the website.
The booking is considered completed once payment has been made by credit card, debit card or bank card.
The payment service provider is CAIXABANK (bank account number: ES60 2100 1512 2602 0067 6927).
Refund policy.
To request a refund, the Lessee must contact us at info@zodiacsrentacar.es or by calling +34 683 192 422 and provide their IBAN and full name.
The Lessor will execute the transfer within 15 working days.

items: A full refund is only possible if the booking is cancelled at least 3 calendar days (72 hours) before the start of the rental period.
The Lessor does not refund any part of the rental fee if the vehicle is returned earlier than specified in the Agreement.
Refunds, where applicable, are made by bank transfer.

sections.heading: 10. Amendment of These General Conditions
paragraphs: The Lessor reserves the right to amend the General Conditions at any time, in particular to reflect regulatory changes or adjustments to the commercial policy applied.

sections.heading: 11. Governing Law and Jurisdiction
paragraphs: For any disputes arising from these conditions, the Parties waive any other jurisdiction and accept the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Santa Cruz de Tenerife, in accordance with the applicable Spanish legislation.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.intro: We‚Äôve collected the most important information to make your rental smooth both on Fuerteventura and Lanzarote.

items.question: How can I book a car?
items.answer: Fill in our online quote request form and our colleagues will confirm your rental within 24 hours at most. If it‚Äôs urgent, you can also call us or send a WhatsApp message.

items.question: What documents do I need at pick-up?
items.answer: At pick-up you‚Äôll need a valid driving licence with at least 3 years of driving experience and an ID card or passport. All contracted drivers must present these documents at pick-up.

items.question: Do I have to pay a deposit?
items.answer: If you choose full SSCP insurance, we do not request a deposit. With basic insurance, you should expect a deposit of 300‚Äì500 ‚Ç¨, and some extras (such as roof racks) may require an additional security deposit.

items.question: Where can I pick up the car?
items.answer: You can pick up the car at the airport, at our office in Puerto del Rosario or at your accommodation on Fuerteventura and Lanzarote. The exact pick-up location will be specified in the confirmation.

items.question: Can I cancel my booking free of charge?
items.answer: Yes, you can modify or cancel your booking free of charge up to 72 hours before the start of the rental. If something comes up closer to the start date, contact us as soon as possible.

items.question: What is the minimum age for renting?
items.answer: For most of our vehicles the minimum age is 23 years. For younger drivers, an individual assessment and a possible surcharge may apply.

items.question: Can I pick up the car at the airport?
items.answer: Yes, when booking you can indicate if you‚Äôd like airport pick-up or transfer.

items.question: Can I return the car at the airport?
items.answer: Yes, you can also return the car at the airport ‚Äì just arrange the time with us in advance.

items.question: What are your opening hours?
items.answer: Pick-up usually takes place between 10:00 and 16:00, but we are flexible by prior arrangement. You can return the car at any time.

items.question: Can I return the car in the evening or at night?
items.answer: Yes. At handover we always explain the return procedure so you can safely return the car at any time.

items.question: Does the car have full insurance?
items.answer: Yes, damage on public roads is covered by the insurer. Damage or punctures occurring off-road must be paid by the renter.

items.question: Do I have to refuel the car before returning it?
items.answer: Yes, you must return the car with the same fuel level as when you picked it up. All vehicles in our fleet run on 95 octane petrol.

items.question: Is there a mileage limit?
items.answer: No, we offer unlimited mileage, which is included in the rental price.

items.question: Can I pay by credit or debit card?
items.answer: Yes, we accept both credit and debit cards.

items.question: Is there a surcharge for a second driver?
items.answer: No, we do not charge any extra if you add a second driver.

items.question: Are there any hidden costs on top of the rental price?
items.answer: No, you only pay the confirmed rental price, with no hidden charges.

items.question: Can I request a child seat for the car?
items.answer: Yes, we offer ISOFIX child seats in several sizes, from infants to older children.

items.question: Do I have to clean the car before returning it?
items.answer: No, you don‚Äôt. We thoroughly clean and disinfect every returned car ‚Äì this is included in the rental price.
